title: (x) Serif face on "Second Harvest Gleaners" non-profit website - Bitstream Carmina {Dav}
content:
I’m trying to identify the top (black) font... to my eye, the major distinguishing characteristics are the slant of the “e” and the angled serifs of both the upper and lower case “s”.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134615im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wmgnewheader_5995.gif)

 [‹ (x) "Gwendolyn and the Good Time Gang" titling face - Roundest TS {Paul-Kenji Cahier}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134615/http:/typophile.com/node/33971 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Aqualung "Making Memory Man" squarish sans - Rhode {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134615/http:/typophile.com/node/34037 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Elm
